Product Details

BILT Sprint Gloves

Product Details
Part numbers
Sizing & Fit

Features:

  • Perforated finger and back of hand for added air flow
  • Pre-curved sport fit
  • Molded, vented air-flow hard knuckle and finger sliders
  • Unlined for a closer, more precise fit
  • Pull-through hook and loop wrist closure

Materials:

  • Full leather construction
  • Suede reinforced overlays at palm
  • Suede overlays at index, middle finger and grip
  • Contrasting, high tensile external stitching

BILT For Summer Heat

The Sprint Gloves from BILT are an aggressive, short cuff glove that are ready to transport you from apex to apex in the warmer months. Perforation along the back of the hand and fingers increase airflow. The unlined, full leather construction balances protection with uninterrupted communication between rider and machine.

BILT To Protect

Suede overlays add reinforcement at the palm and grip at the control interface the forward portion of the palm, index, and middle fingers. Molded TPR knuckle and finger sliders are also vented to boost airflow further. Ready for the torquiest machines, a hook and loop closure wraps the wrist and delivers a snug, secure fit.

Ahmed Mohamed
VERIFIED PURCHASER
December 29, 2012

Size UP - Did Not Fit

Ordered a size Medium, my normal usual size, based on the Size Chart hand measurements. Once received, I could not get my hands through the cuff openings, no matter how hard I tried. Gloves were promptly returned. Comparing to my other gloves, the BILT Sprint glove fingers are shorter too. Size UP - don't trust the attached Size Chart.
